title: Key Fragments not dropping
body:
I just want to clarify I read the 6.6 patch notes and did see the part about key fragments not dropping in other non-Summoners Rift game types 

> "First off, we'll quickly mention we're aware of a bug where key fragments aren't dropping after matchmade Treeline or ARAM wins."

This post will be about Summoners Rift Key Fragments. I have been playing regularly since the day they were added. I opened my first box and key that were given to me on release day. Shortly after I have received 3 boxes and 3 Key Fragments to make one key.  Since then I haven't received any new Key Fragments while I play ranked and normal modes.  While friends I'm playing with have been getting a ton of Key Fragments for playing the same game I was in.

From what I remember reading the Key Fragments are a random drop from games. I seem to be either extremely unlucky or there is something missing

If anyone else is having this problem please comment here so riot is aware of the issue.

replies.body: The drop rate decreases to the point where you can easily win 15 or so games and not get a key.  Riot should display the current key drop rate- otherwise it is frustrating.

Yeah, at this point- i've won over 20+ wins in both ranked and normals and not a single ... key drop. The more key fragments you get, the harder / unlikely the next drop will be. This mechanic is flat out infuriating and I despise it with a passion. I want to earn my key fragments through time & effort, not by some random chance that decreases every time I do eventually get a key fragment.

It makes me lose interest in Hextech Crafting, and I have two chests just sitting in my inventory waiting to be opened but I don't have any keys period.
Riot please fix this, or make it where we get key fragments far more often.

Eh, key fragments become rarer as you find more makes sense. It lets casual players be able to get keys without having to grind. The problem is that the current drop rates fall so quickly that dedicated players can't get keys *despite* grinding.

To start, check your profile on the client to see if you can still earn a chest. When there's an open spot, it fills up after 7 days for each square. Meaning if you got all of them on the same day, it'd take 28 days for it to completely fill up, 7 days for each chest.

If you have chests to earn, make sure the champion you're using is owned.

If so, have you earned it with that champion already? You can only earn a box with each champion per season. You can still earn it for your friends though.

As an example, if you're Yorick and get a D-, but your Elise friend you queued with gets an S, you get a chest and can't earn it again on Yorick, even those it was an Elise that scored the S. Your friend can repeat that on Elise for you on any other champ you play. They won't get a chest, but you will.
